### What to do for Week 1 after class ends^[For grading.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(unchecked, 
               checked),

Description = c("Start a module in Data Camp that addresses the basic elements of R",
               "Complete problems 3, 4, 6, 7, and 8 in Chapter 1."),
```
